Posts.Content: shelbyz wrote: It has been a whirlwind.  I was diagnoised Dec 26 with Invasive Lobular Carcinoma. Visited the surgeon on Jan 3rd, and Plastic surgeron on Jan 4th.  Had a mastectomy on Jan16th, they found two tumors  one 1.2 cm and the other 2.8cm. Stage 2 Grade 2.  Did not spread to any lymph nodes. Waiting to see the Onco in three weeks to get results of BRCA test to figure out if I need any Chemo or Just Tomoxiflyn (sp wrong).  It is ER+ PR+ and Her2nu-.... This is good right?  what concerns should I have?  This is all so new and some say over, but I'm not sure. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Help with results shelbyz Lories
